title: Off-Road Points to Count for WorldTour? The UCI Says Maybe as CX World Cup Clicks into Gear
content:
The 2024-25 UCI cyclocross World Cup series opens this weekend in Antwerp: 'We have put together a good puzzle.'

Read the full article at Off-Road Points to Count for WorldTour? The UCI Says Maybe as CX World Cup Clicks into Gear on Velo.
author: ahood
